about_the_game:
Stardawn Heroes is a rogue-lite action adventure game set throughout the stars. Explore a vast universe of alien planets teeming with exotic and familiar lifeforms. Battle your way through these procedurally generated worlds and harvest the unique resources they have to offer. Craft a variety of weapons, armors, and items on your starship as you jump from planet to planet on your journey to the Gateway of the Ancients.

Features:

  • Procedurally Generated Content: Handcrafted worlds that are randomly generated offer a high replay value each visit and will bring you a new challenge every run.
  • Unique Worlds: Discover new worlds as you venture across the cosmos. Each world type is unique and hosts its own fauna, flora, and minerals.
  • Resources: Various resources to mine, woodcut, and forage from each planet.
  • Classes: Choose from 5 different species' to play as, along with varied playstyles.
  • Leveling: Become more powerful by defeating enemies or critters.
  • Items: Craft or buy a variety of items such as weapons, armors, tools, energy cells, etc.
  • Crafting: Craft items from the various materials found on planets or purchase crafting material from a vendor on space stations to make items you want.
